page.title: 01Gazetteer LISVANE
page.content: The area is bisected by the {M.4.Motorway,}south of which the primary land cover is housing,mostly modern,and privately owned forming dormitory suburbs whose population are largely employed outside the area. At {Thornhill,}in the west, housing development is being undertaken at present,on land that was previously used for arable farming. North of the M.4. the land rises steeply and assumes a more mountainous nature. It is sparsely populated,but supports mixed farming and forestry,with sheep grazing the steeper and less fertile ground. In the past, this upland region has provided quarries and mines for stone and mineral extraction,but these are now disused.
